title: Can we get some skin love for Aurelion Sol?
body:
i mean ekko got a skin like 8 months after release and it was basically just a recolor with a new outfit. there are plenty of cool fanart designs and im sure riots skin team can come up with a good design for a GIANT SPACE DRAGON., even if it ends up being a fancy recolor because that would be sick anyway with his stars.

http://u28.imgup.net/comic35cf.png



http://i.imgur.com/EKFGHb5.png


 
are some of the popular ones ive seen


EDIT: wow thanks for the upvote on the lazy thread lol

replies.body: Aurelio Sol can wait till Jhin gets a new skin, as Jhin came out before him and is still waiting too.
Jhin can wait until Illaoi gets one.
Illaoi has to wait till Yorick gets one
Yorick can wait until ... oh, hold on ...
Jhin missed a skin for 4 months. Now he has to wait 4 years.
I want to upvote this but it's already at 4. Can someone downvote it real quick so that I can upvote?
Done! lol.
Much <3.

> [{quoted}](name=Revan Senpai,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kM46kmr5,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-05T22:07:15.550+0000)
>
> Much <4.

ftfy
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Why does this have 8 upvotes? It should be 4  {{item:3070}} {{champion:202}}  {{item:3070}}
downvoted to make it closer to four... Or maybe i should have upvoted to try and get 44

> [{quoted}](name=Dolasaur,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kM46kmr5,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-05T21:48:25.424+0000)
>
> Jhin missed a skin for 4 months. Now he has to wait 4 years.

I want to upvote this, but it's at 4 upvotes
My main Yorick has been reworked... and I have still been waiting 3 YEARS!
Meanwhile {{champion:112}}  got his last skin 3 years ago (1/8/2013)
{{champion:83}} Boi, you ain't got any room to talk.
{{champion:6}} yeah, wait your turns
Actually, Urgot got his last skin earlier than Yorick did. Yorick is currently the champion who hasn't gotten his next skin the longest.
Ikr? Yorick has been waiting for a skin literally years before any of these champions were even created.

Yasu!
The {{champion:136}} mains {{champion:136}} ted by the lack of new skins!
BWAHAHAHAHAHHAHAhAHAHAHHAHAHA
I'm hoping {{champion:136}} gets a Chinese dragon skin! Similar to firecracker Jinx! it would be sooo AWESOME!
I want to see Bonus Boss ASol.
I'd rather see Boss Illaoi, she's honestly more of a bossfight, plus 8 bit tentacles.
Raid Boss Illaoi after going 8/0

I want Dark Star, Pop Star, and Star Guardian Aurelion Sol.
And I suppose any future skinline with the word "star" in it.
But isn't that a bit... redundant?
Woah cool!
really hoping for final boss Aurelion Sol or something of the sort. He's perfect for it.
I'd love to see snow day aurelion sol
At least have a dark star skin for sol, it would be as if he were corrupted.

if we do that we have to change his lines to be less snarky and condescending to be just a complete ASol (hehehe) and hate everyone and want to destroy all the stars and maybe make his stars black holes so its like he got rid of his stars to be the opposite?

> [{quoted}](name=robothax,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kM46kmr5,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2016-12-06T01:32:42.970+0000)
>
> if we do that we have to change his lines to be less snarky and condescending to be just a complete ASol (hehehe) and hate everyone and want to destroy all the stars and maybe make his stars black holes so its like he got rid of his stars to be the opposite?

When you say it like that he sounds like he would be an angsty teenager or something. "hmmm... maybe ill destroy a galaxy or... whatever.. "
THATS A FUNNY WAY TO SPELL JHIN. WHICH HAS A HI PLAY RATE BEEN OUT FOR MORE THAN A YEAR AND STILL HAS ONE SKIN
More than a year? Jhin was released in February 2016
Oh lol i thought it was november xd

Not to mention:

- Stormborn Aurelion Sol (aka Ao Shin)
- Worldbraker Aurelion Sol (perfect fit)
- Darkstar Aurelion Sol
- Voidborn Aurelion Sol
- Eternium Aurelion Sol

And I think ppl can come up with 100s of different skin concepts.

Edit: Adding more stuff

- Jade Aurelion Sol
- Spooky Aurelion Sol (Massive dragon with ghost-like blankets)
- Pool Party Aurelion Sol
I would kill for an elderwood aurelion sol

ok so soul stealer Sol
Blood mood Sol
and Program Sol roit pls

Blood Moon Sol...

*needs new underwear*
so amazing you will ~~****~~ yourself
Still waiting on another Illaoi, zac, Rek' Sai skin
and jhin

These 3 first, then jhin
Well at LEAST Illaoi first

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kM46kmr5,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2016-12-06T00:38:41.012+0000)
>
> Still waiting on another Illaoi, zac, Rek' Sai skin

*whispers* take a look at that new GP recall and tell me it doesn't seem like the opportunity for an Illaoi skin. TELL ME.
So no Kha'Zix or Rengar skin...?
Aurel will probably get a dark star skin first.
There's many of cool designs of ASol I seen I'm surprised the money hasn't gone to their head yet.

Actually Ekko got his first skin 3 months after release but was only a 750 so not much work went into that.   Sol though has a lot of particles to work with so I'm guessing that's what will take a bit for him as well.
We don't talk about schoolgirl ekko
